articles.author: Ashutosh Joshi, Ishika Mookerjee
articles.title: A $7.5 Billion Derivative Trade Shifts to India as SGX Feud Ends - Bloomberg
articles.description: Derivative contracts with a notional value of about $7.5 billion traded in Singapore will shift to India as a cross-border trading link between the two Asian countries’ top bourses gets fully operational on Monday.
